The workflow execution continues regardless of the error, what happens is that the gRPC connection that listens to history events is getting timed out. By default it is set to 2 minutes.
Quick way to go around that is to add --context_timeout flag.

As part of this filed bug, i might add better response clarifying the --context_timeout flag, or possibly change the behavior / necessity of --context_timeout. Will keep posted

@feedmeapples the _run_ command is expected to wait for the workflow completion indefinitely using long poll. The long poll is expected to return before the 2 minutes and the client should make a new call. So I'm not sure why the timeout is happening unless the context is used to stop making long poll requests.

title: CLI: "workflow run" times out after 2 minutes.
